subject: College Athletics
Mascots
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jack Dalrymple signed a law allowing the University of North Dakota to drop its 81-year-old Fighting Sioux nickname, satisfying an N.C.A.A. demand that it drop the name or risk sanctions.
snippet: Gov. Jack Dalrymple signed a law allowing the University of North Dakota to drop its 81-year-old Fighting Sioux nickname, satisfying an N.C.A.A. demand that it drop the name or risk sanctions.
